column1: # TODO_CD ADD THE CHARACTER TO THE ANTIQUARIAN TITLE:""
steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1001.desc0:"One of the obvious hurdles to retrieving the artifact
column5: multiple ways to... #EMP deal#! with a person
column6: but I wonder if [antiquarian.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] is the type of person whom I could persuade to look the other way by offering a suitable bribe."

column1: steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1001.a0:"Gold is the universal language of bribery."
steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1001.a.tt0:"You believe [antiquarian.GetTitledFirstNamePossessive] loyalty can be bought with riches..."
steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1001.b.tt0:"[antiquarian.GetTitledFirstName] will agree to an even trade."""""
steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1001.c0:"An introduction to [random_beauty.GetTitledFirstName] might prove... #EMP stimulating#!."
steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1001.c.tt0:"You're hedging your bets on [antiquarian.GetTitledFirstName] appreciating physical beauty above loyalties."
steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1001.d0:"I'll look into other possibilities instead."

column2: ROOT.Char)] to monitor [target.GetTitledFirstName] so that we can find the perfect opportunity to pilfer an artifact from [target.GetHerHim].\n\nProgress
column4: has been much slower than I'd like. Perhaps I should give [agent.GetHerHim] something specific to look out for?"

column1: steal_back_artifact_ongoing.1002.b0:"I trust them to do their job."
